gpt-message.content: You are an expert in hardware design with a deep understanding of Verilog RTL codes. ```

This directive is used to define the time unit and time precision for the simulation but does not specify any module or describe its functionality.

**Explanation:** Not applicable as there are no modules or ports defined in the provided code snippet.

Internal signals and their explanation is as follows:
